TabStyleOne.title: Seamless Whatsapp Integration – Smart, Fast, and Reliable!
Seamless Email Integration – Smart, Fast, and Reliable!
Manually Upload Invoice and get processed instantly

advanceTab.subTitle: How it work
advanceTab.title: Seemless Onboarding with a simple Sign Up
advanceTab.desc: The moment you sign in using Email or Mobile number, our system automatically connects to the respective API, linking your account securely. Once connected, the application is ready to receive invoices instantly—no extra setup required.

advanceTab.subTitle: Effortless Invoice Collection
advanceTab.title: Receive Invoices Instantly
advanceTab.desc: Stop worrying about gathering invoices manually! Simply receive your invoices via WhatsApp or Email, and our system will automatically fetch them using secure API integrations.

advanceTab.subTitle: Smart Automation at Its Best
advanceTab.title: AI Powered Processing   Accurate, Fast, and Efficient
advanceTab.desc: Harness the power of AI-driven OCR technology to extract, analyze, and structure invoice data with lightning speed. Our intelligent system automatically recognizes and processes invoices from WhatsApp, Email, and multiple file formats.

advanceTab.subTitle: Stay in Control of Your Invoices
advanceTab.title: View Your Dashboard
advanceTab.desc: Get a clear and organized view of all your invoices in one centralized dashboard. Track incoming invoices, monitor processing status, and access structured data in real time.
